The A, number one most critical thing at a party is to have good lighting.
First of all, turn off the overheads.
Number one rule: just turn them all off.
Additionally, I would say candles everywhere.
When you fill a room with candles, little magical things happen,...
...like little reflections. If you have a mirror and you've got candles in front of it...
...and you've got a lot of silver and maybe some mixed metals,...
...that creates all that sparkle and reflection.
It feels like you really tried.
